# 表格

下面是在quarto中的一些不同类型的表格示例：

You can see in @tbl-LABEL1, that this table is from R code...

```{r}
#| label: tbl-LABEL1
#| tbl-cap: CAPTION1

knitr::kable(head(cars), align = "c")
```

You can see in @tbl-LABEL2, that this table is from Python code...

```{python}
#| label: tbl-LABEL2
#| tbl-cap: CAPTION2
import pandas as pd, tabulate
from IPython.display import Markdown
df = pd.DataFrame({"A": [1, 2], 
                   "B": [1, 2]})
Markdown(df.to_markdown(index=False))
```

```{r}
#| column: page

knitr::kable(
  mtcars[1:3, 1:3], align = "c")
```

```{r}
#| column: margin

knitr::kable(
  mtcars[1:3, 1:3], align = "c")
```
